name: Green Enchilada Chicken

instructions.en: Sprinkle each side of the chicken breasts with 1/4 teaspoon of the taco seasoning.
Heat oil in a large skillet; sauté the chicken until just done or grill on an outdoor or indoor grill. Don't overcook.
Place cooked chicken in a greased 9 x 13 inch baking pan.
Mix sour cream, green sauce, chiles, and cilantro (if using) in a small bowl.
Pour the sauce mixture over the chicken.
For microwave method: Cook on MEDIUM until hot and bubbly.
Top each piece with 1/4 of the cheese and return to the microwave until the cheese is melted.
For oven method: Bake in a 350°F (175°C) oven for 25 minutes.
Top with cheese and bake an additional 5 minutes until the cheese is melted.
If desired, top with chopped green onions before serving.

notes: This recipe makes 4 servings. Do not freeze. Xanthan gum is optional and can be used to thicken the sauce if desired.
